function.name: get_car_specs
function.description: Fetches detailed specifications for a car based on the given trim ID.

trimid.description: The trim ID of the car for which to retrieve specifications.

function.name: get_country_by_fifa_code
function.description: Gets information about a country using its FIFA assigned country code from the Geography API.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to filter the response. Defaults to None.

function.name: world_coordinate_to_income
function.description: Fetches per capita income data for a given set of geographic coordinates (longitude and latitude) using the provided API key.

messages.content: What is the per capita income in New York City and Tokyo?

function.name: actors_list_born_today
function.description: Fetches a list of actors and actresses born on a specific day and month from the Online Movie Database via the RapidAPI platform.

month.description: The month of birth of the actors.

day.description: The day of birth of the actors.

function.name: v1_latest_headlines
function.description: Fetches the latest 100 headlines based on specified language, topic, and/or country, and optionally includes media information.

lang.description: Specifies the language of the search. Allowed values include 'af', 'ar', 'bg', 'bn', 'ca', 'cn', 'cs', 'cy', 'da', 'de', 'el', 'en', 'es', 'et', 'fa', 'fi', 'fr', 'gu', 'he', 'hi', 'hr', 'hu', 'id', 'it', 'ja', 'kn', 'ko', 'lt', 'lv', 'mk', 'ml', 'mr', 'ne', 'nl', 'no', 'pa', 'pl', 'pt', 'ro', 'ru', 'sk', 'sl', 'so', 'sq', 'sv', 'sw', 'ta', 'te', 'th', 'tl', 'tr', 'tw', 'uk', 'ur', 'vi'. Defaults to 'en'.

topic.description: The topic to which you want to restrict the articles. Accepted values are 'news', 'sport', 'tech', 'world', 'finance', 'politics', 'business', 'economics', 'entertainment', 'beauty', 'travel', 'music', 'food', 'science'. This parameter is experimental and not all articles may have a topic assigned.

country.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search, specified using ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes. This parameter is experimental and is best used in conjunction with the 'lang' parameter.

media.description: If set to 'True', adds additional media information to the output, including the main image and a comma-separated string of all images used in an article. Defaults to 'True'.

function.name: image_stable_prompter
function.description: Generates a prompt for stable diffusion using an image URL via the Toolbench RapidAPI.

url.description: The full path of the image URL to be processed. Defaults to None.

function.name: getresult
function.description: Retrieves the result of a previously requested video rendering job using the given job ID.

job_id.description: The ID of the previously requested rendering job.

function.name: search
function.description: Search the Icons8 repository for icons based on various parameters.

term.description: The term to search for within the Icons8 repository.

size.description: The size of the icons in pixels. Defaults to 64.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 20.

color.description: The color of the icons in hexadecimal format. Defaults to 'ff0000'.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to collect the output. Defaults to 0.

function.name: random_mlem
function.description: Fetches one random mlem image in JSON format based on the given optional parameters.

tag.description: Tag to filter the mlem images.

orientation.description: Orientation of the image, can be 'square', 'landscape', or 'portrait'.

messages.content: Fetch a random mlem image with a bright brightness and a landscape orientation.
